rukus.text: 67|1|mcheasa del meanamnach nowknong kandabdai robsa trong mha utdongk utdam  haey trong mean anoupheap leu avei  teangoasa .

67|2|kuchea mcheasa del ban bangkeut kar slab  ning kar rsa daembi sak  lbong puok anak  tae anak namuoy knongchamnaom puok anak del ban sang  ampeula cheangke?  haey trong mha khlangpouke  mha aphytosa .

67|3|kuchea mcheasa del ban bangkeut mekh brapir chean tam rieb pi leu knea .  anak( mou ham meat) minkheunh mean pheap chhkachhkang knong kar bangkeut robsa mcheasa  mha sabborsa laey .  dau che  neah chaur anak kralek meul mdongtiet  tae anak  kheunh mean kanleng be  reah sram der ryyte

67|4|banteabmk  chaur anak kralek meul mdong haey mdongtiet choh  kar meulkheunh noh nung vilotralb mokkan anak vinh knong sapheap ameasa ( daoy min meulkheunh mean pheap khveahkhat avei laey)  haey vea mean  pheap nueyoht bamphot .

67|5|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban tobteng loma mekh chean  kraom daoy hvaung tara .  haey yeung ban bangkeut vea( hvaung tara)daembi  b ne  d nh puok shai t n .  haey yeung ban riebcham samreab puokvea nouv  tearounakamm nei phleung nork del cheh santhosanthow .
67|6|haey samreab puok del brachheang nung mcheasa robsa puokke ku  tearounakamm nei nork cheu han nam  del chea kanleng vilotralb da akrak  bamphot .
67|7|nowpel del puokke trauv ban ke kroveng chaul tow knong vea( nork)  puokke banlyy samrek yeang khlang  khn del vea kampoungte pouhkanhchrol .

67|8|vea staerte bek khchatkhchay daoysaarte kamhoeng( champoh puok  del brachheang) .  real pel del krom muoy trauv ban ke kroveng chaul tow  knong vea  anakyeam robsa vea ban suor tow puokke tha  tae anak dasatuen  promean( anakneasar) minban mokadl puok anak te ryy

67|9|puokke ban chhlaey tha  mean pitabrakd men .  anak dasatuen  promean pitchea ban mokadl puok yeung men  bo nde puok yeung ban bde- se th .  haey puok yeung ban niyeay tha  a l laoh minban banhchouh  avei b ndi ch mk laey .  puok anak(anakneasar  ning anak ruom chomnue cheamuoy  keat) kmeanoavei krawpi sthet knong pheap v nge  v ng da sen chhngay noh laey .
67|10|puokke ban niyeay( towkean anakyeam nork) tiet tha  brasenbae puok yeung thleab ban sdab( anakneasar)  ryy puok yeung ban  svengoyl noh  puok yeung pitchea min sthet knong puok nork laey .
67|11|pelnoh  puokke ban ttuoloskal nouv babakamm robsa  puokke .  dau che  neah  kar khleatachhngay( pi kdei me tda krounea robsa a l laoh  noh) ku samreab puok thanonork .
67|12|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa  puokke daoy athrkambang  puokke nung ttuol ban nouv kar aphytosa  ning phalbony da thomtheng .
67|13|haey chaur puok anak leakbang nouv peakyasaamdei robsa puok anak  ryy puok anak leatatradeang vea choh  pitabrakd nasa  trong doeng bamphot nouv avei  del mean nowknong chetd .
67|14|tae mcheasa del ban bangkeut( avei  teangoasa) minban doeng te ryy?  haey trong kuchea anak del tnphlon  doeng chruotachreab bamphot .
